title: Mixed Methodology Application for Organizational Learning and Stakeholder Emotional Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, data collection methods, and foundational organizational management concepts
context.additional_context: Analysis of real-world cases and project execution using corporate environmental policy-related data.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for stakeholder sentiment analysis using social media data.
Learners can design organizational learning processes applying a mixed-methods approach (case study + quantitative analysis).
Learners can visualize and interpret environmental policy-related data to propose organizational improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
